description: Try our easy to follow Frozen Christmas Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Frozen Christmas Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line an 8 cup capacity pudding basin with plastic wrap.
Using an electric mixer, beat cream cheese for 5 minutes until light and fluffy. Add ice cream and continue to beat until combined.
Roughly crush one packet of Oreo cookies. Set aside the remaining packet. Fold raspberries, pistachios, flake and oreos into ice cream mix.
Pour mixture into prepared basin. Freeze for 30 minutes.
Place remaining Oreo cookies in food processor. Process until fine crumbs form. Add butter. Process until combined.
Spoon over top of ice cream, pressing with the back of a spoon to level. Cover with plastic wrap and freeze overnight.
Turn pudding onto chilled serving plate.
Melt dark chocolate melts in a microwave safe bowl on medium heat for 2 minutes. Stir in oil and mix well.
Drizzle the melted chocolate over the pudding. Decorate with flake and fresh raspberries.
